trans-unit.source: Represents a single requested claim in a security token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: Representerer et enkelt forespurte krav i en token forespørsel for sikkerhet (første).

trans-unit.source: Represents a single claim inside a wst:Claims element in a wst:RequestSecurityToken message.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et enkelt krav i et wst:Claims element i en wst:RequestSecurityToken-melding.

trans-unit.source: The entire contents of the wst:Claims element is represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection> which is a collection of RequestClaim objects.
trans-unit.target: Hele innholdet i elementet wst:Claims representeres av en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection>som er en samling RequestClaim objekter.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaimCollection>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the wst:Claims element is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i elementet wst:Claims er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken.Claims%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A RequestClaim object represents a request for a claim, identified by its claim type (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.ClaimType%2A> property), to be present in the security token issued by the STS.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for RequestClaim representerer en forespørsel om et krav, identifisert av filtypen kravet (den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.ClaimType%2A>egenskapen), i sikkerhetstokenet som er utstedt av STS.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.ClaimType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A> property indicates whether the claim is required in the in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A>egenskapen angir om kravet kreves i den i det utstedte tokenet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om elementet som denne klassen representerer, kan du se versjonen av WS-Trust spesifikasjonen som gjelder for scenariet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"> </xref> klassen med den angitte kravtypen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A> property is set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A>er satt til `false` og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A>er satt til `null` i det nye <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim>forekomsten.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.IsOptional%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> object that represents a request for a claim that is required in the response.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim>objektet som representerer en forespørsel om et krav som kreves i svaret.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim>

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the claim type.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som representerer kravtypen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type and a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"> </xref> klassen med den angitte kravtypen og en verdi som angir om kravet er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A> property is set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A>er satt til `null` i det nye <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim>forekomsten.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the claim type.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som representerer kravtypen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kravet er valgfritt i svaret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"></xref> class with the specified claim type, claim value, and a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestClaim"> </xref> klassen med den angitte kravtypen, kravet verdi og en verdi som angir om kravet er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the claim type.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som representerer kravtypen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kravet er valgfritt i svaret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the claim.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for kravet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the requested claim.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for det forespurte kravet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the ClaimType Uri attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representerer innholdet i ClaimType Uri-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The URI that represents the claim type.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som representerer kravtypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the request claim is optional in the response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om forespørselen kravet er valgfrie i svaret.

trans-unit.source: Represents the ClaimType optional attribute.
trans-unit.target: Representerer ClaimType valgfrie attributtet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the claim is optional in the response; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kravet er valgfritt i svaret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the requested claim value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den forespurte Kravverdien.

trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the ClaimType value element.
trans-unit.target: Representerer innholdet i elementet ClaimType verdi.

trans-unit.source: The value of the claim.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for kravet.
